titles.title: Ta Chengle Bing Jiao Junwang De Bai Yueguang
She Became the White Moonlight of the Sick King ,She Becomes The Yandere King's White Moonligh,t Tā Chéngle Bìng Jiāo Jūnwáng De Bái Yuèguāng
她成了病娇君王的白月光

data.title: Ta Chengle Bing Jiao Junwang De Bai Yueguang
data.title_japanese: 她成了病娇君王的白月光
title_synonyms: She Became the White Moonlight of the Sick King ,She Becomes The Yandere King's White Moonligh,t Tā Chéngle Bìng Jiāo Jūnwáng De Bái Yuèguāng
data.synopsis:
After suddenly dying in a plane crash,  a woman from modern times ends up transmigrating into the body of  the heroine from a novel. The eldest daughter of Duke Yue, at 16 years of age. Only to find out she is to be a villainess (crossdressing as a male), and will die a horrible death in the end.  She meets the protagonist before the plot line of the novel begins, and is told by the "Sweetie" the game admin that she must not deviate from the plot line or she will be electrocuted. Sweetie also tells her that she has a chance to raise  her charisma to save her life. The stakes are high as she has 5 years to go from  - 5000, to 1 billion points!!

[Written by RachelPanda]
